column4: Is there a way to know what kind of RAM do I have inside the PC...? DDR, DDR2, DDR3...
Well, the mainboard supports both DDR and DDR2, I'm not sure what I actually have on it...
http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20080310091556AAuKL59 (I hate linking to Yahoo! Answers, but they seem like reliable answers)
